0.plain text description: Date at which measurement is taken

1.plain text description: Minimum temperature in the 24 hours from 9am. Sometimes only known to the nearest whole degree.

2.plain text description: Maximum temperature in the 24 hours from 9am. Sometimes only known to the nearest whole degree.

3.plain text description: Direction of strongest gust in the 24 hours to midnight

4.plain text description: Speed of strongest wind gust in the 24 hours to midnight

5.plain text description: Precipitation (rainfall) in the 24 hours to 9am. Sometimes only known to the nearest whole millimetre.
